meanings.sent1: Entomophagy is common in many cultures around the world.
meanings.sent2: In some countries, entomophagy is considered a sustainable food source.
meanings.sent3: When discussing entomophagy, some people get a bit squeamish.
meanings.sent4: To some, entomophagy may seem like a bizarre culinary adventure.
meanings.sent5: The concept of entomophagy challenges traditional ideas of food.

meanings.definition: The consumption of insects as food.
meanings.sent1: Entomophagy has been practiced for centuries in various societies.
meanings.sent2: Some restaurants are starting to incorporate entomophagy into their menus.
meanings.sent3: At the exotic food festival, entomophagy was the main attraction.
meanings.sent4: In the world of entomophagy, mealworms are considered a delicacy.
meanings.sent5: The art of entomophagy opens up a whole new world of culinary possibilities.
